item.title: Earthquake Classification
item.description: Project Overview This project’s mainly deals with Extensive EDA, Model Training with Hyperparameter tuning and Cross-Validation.

item.title: Face Recognition of Avengers with FaceNet
item.description: Project Overview Used pre-trained FaceNet architecture, we performed face recognition task for Avengers using Triplet Loss as our loss function.

item.title: SEIR Modelling of COVID-19
item.description: Project Overview Performed time-series prediction of Covid-19 infections through SEIR model.

item.title: Table-Tennis shot classification using OpenPose
item.description: Project Overview To classify whether the shot played in the given video is backhand or forehand.
